title: Inter row companion drills 6m
summary: Inter row companion drill which uses either tines or discs to produce the seeding slot.

eligible.eligibleBullet01: be an inter row companion drill
eligible.eligibleBullet02: use either tines or discs to produce the seeding slot
eligible.eligibleBullet03: have a drilling width of at least 5.9m
eligible.eligibleBullet05: place the seed in the seeding slot
eligible.eligibleBullet06: drill between the rows of an established growing crop
eligible.eligibleBullet07: be able to vary widths between coulters
eligible.eligibleBullet08: have minimum inter row spacing between coulters of 45cm
eligible.eligibleBullet09: drill the full range of arable and cover crops including cereals

notEligible.notEligibleBullet01: drills that use broadcasting or over seeding to place the seed in the seed bed
notEligible.notEligibleBullet02: drills with cultivation or seed bed preparation equipment in front of the seeding slot
